txt.en:
'You have done well so far, but I have need of your services a bit further. There is a nearby cavern area where the merrevail live. They are led by one of the evil morroval-lieutenants, if such a word applies.

'Her name is Iarvael, and she haunts us even in our dreams. Please remove her threat once and for all, then return to me when the deed is done.

'This will be no small task, and you should gather one or two of your friends to help you, [placeholder].'
'You have done the Rangers of Gath Forthnír a great service. You have allowed us to stop taking the defensive posture.\n\n'We must take this fight to Carn Dûm!'
'If you desire to assist us in our plight, journey west and find the cavern and defeat Iarvael.'
Himbar is haunted by the merrevail and their kindred, the bats. These creatures prey upon the Rangers of Gath Forthnír, showing no mercy.
The merrevail hunt throughout Himbar, the lands west of Gath Forthnír.\n\nThoriel has asked you to remove the lieutenant, Iarvael, from the morroval caverns.
Thoriel waits for you in Gath Forthnír, the hidden Ranger-camp east of Himbar.\n\nYou have defeated Iorvael and should now return to Thoriel with news of your victory.
